languages.text: "Лекс Империалис не запрещает романы и даже браки между многими. Но мне они всегда претили".

traits.locale_text: {n}Соломон обжигает вас недобрым взглядом.{/n} "Собираешь коллекцию воздыхателей — делай это без меня".
traits.speaker: SolomorneCompanion

languages.text: "The Lex Imperialis does not forbid relationships or even marriages between multiple partners. But I have always found them repellent."
languages.original_text: "Лекс Империалис не запрещает романы и даже браки между многими. Но мне они всегда претили".

traits.locale_text: "The Lex Imperialis does not forbid relationships or even marriages between multiple partners. But I have always found them repellent."
"The Lex Imperialis does not forbid relationships or even marriages between multiple partners. But I have always found them repellent."
"The Lex Imperialis does not forbid relationships or even marriages between multiple partners. But I have always found them repellent."
"The Lex Imperialis does not forbid relationships or even marriages between multiple partners. But I have always found them repellent."
"The Lex Imperialis does not forbid relationships or even marriages between multiple partners. But I have always found them repellent."

languages.text: "Das Lex Imperia verbietet keine Beziehungen oder Ehen mit mehreren Partnern. Ich empfand das allerdings schon immer als abstoßend."
languages.original_text: "The Lex Imperialis does not forbid relationships or even marriages between multiple partners. But I have always found them repellent."

traits.locale_text: "Das Lex Imperia verbietet keine Beziehungen oder Ehen mit mehreren Partnern. Ich empfand das allerdings schon immer als abstoßend."

languages.text: « La Lex Imperialis n'interdit pas les relations ni même les mariages entre plusieurs partenaires, mais personnellement, je trouve ces pratiques repoussantes. »
languages.original_text: "The Lex Imperialis does not forbid relationships or even marriages between multiple partners. But I have always found them repellent."

traits.locale_text: « La Lex Imperialis n'interdit pas les relations ni même les mariages entre plusieurs partenaires, mais personnellement, je trouve ces pratiques repoussantes. »

languages.text: 「レックス・インペリアは、複数のパートナーとの関係や結婚すらも禁じてはいません。ですが私は、そういったものを常に嫌悪してきました」
languages.original_text: "The Lex Imperialis does not forbid relationships or even marriages between multiple partners. But I have always found them repellent."

traits.locale_text: 「レックス・インペリアは、複数のパートナーとの関係や結婚すらも禁じてはいません。ですが私は、そういったものを常に嫌悪してきました」

languages.text: «La Lex Imperialis no prohíbe las relaciones ni el matrimonio entre múltiples cónyuges, pero a mí siempre me han parecido repelentes».
languages.original_text: "The Lex Imperialis does not forbid relationships or even marriages between multiple partners. But I have always found them repellent."

traits.locale_text: «La Lex Imperialis no prohíbe las relaciones ni el matrimonio entre múltiples cónyuges, pero a mí siempre me han parecido repelentes».

languages.text: “尽管《帝国法典》并没有明令禁止多名伴侣之间的关系，乃至婚姻，但我始终无法接受这一点。”
languages.original_text: "The Lex Imperialis does not forbid relationships or even marriages between multiple partners. But I have always found them repellent."

traits.locale_text: “尽管《帝国法典》并没有明令禁止多名伴侣之间的关系，乃至婚姻，但我始终无法接受这一点。”

languages.text: "Lex İmperialis, birden çok eşle ilişki yaşamayı ve hatta evlenmeyi yasaklamaz. Yine de ben bunları her daim itici bulmuşumdur."
languages.original_text: "The Lex Imperialis does not forbid relationships or even marriages between multiple partners. But I have always found them repellent."

traits.locale_text: "Lex İmperialis, birden çok eşle ilişki yaşamayı ve hatta evlenmeyi yasaklamaz. Yine de ben bunları her daim itici bulmuşumdur."
